data.title: Learn More About Ashton Kutcher at Brightside.me: Explore Now!
data.meta_description: Bright Side brings you fresh and unique Ashton Kutcher articles. Dive into our best topic content gathered here for your enjoyment and knowledge.
data.text:
Ashton Kutcher Shares a Touching Tribute to Mila Kunis to Mark Their Anniversary

Relationships

year ago

Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis are one of those lucky famous couples who only grow stronger under the pressures of fame and the challenges their demanding schedules bring. Ever since they reconnected back in 2012, their love has stood the test of time, and their bond continues to blossom as the couple marks an important milestone.

Ashton Kutcher Breaks Silence on Feeling Responsible for His and Demi Moore’s Toxic Marriage and Losing a Baby Together

Relationships

year ago

Ashton Kutcher and Demi Moore were the “it” couple of the 2000s. Despite their 16-year age gap, they were very much in love and stayed married for over 8 years. But as history often proves, public relationships are rarely what they seem. Moore herself detailed their ill-fated union in her 2019 memoir, which left Kutcher quite upset.

Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis Reunite as a TV Couple in “That ’90s Show,” Bringing Us Sweet Nostalgia

Films

year ago

The iconic sequel series to That ’70s Show, which ran from 1998 to 2006, made a comeback and was recently released as a series on Netflix with a new story and actors. However, the creators had an unexpected surprise for their fans by inviting old characters, including Ashton Kutcher as Michael Kelso and Mila Kunis as Jackie Burkhart, to make a cameo.

Ashton Kutcher Offered to Donate His Heart to Save His Twin Brother Who’s Living With Cerebral Palsy

People

year ago

Cerebral palsy is a condition for which, unfortunately, there is no cure. However, thanks to modern medicine, there are treatments that can improve the existing symptoms and the overall quality of life. Sadly, the number of people with this condition is quite big, and about 2 to 3 children out of every 1,000 have cerebral palsy. But all of them, including Michael Kutcher, actor Ashton Kutcher’s twin brother, prove that nothing can get in your way when you are destined to do great things.

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher See No Point in Bathing Their Kids Unless They Look Dirty and It Actually Makes Sense

People

2 years ago

Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis are household names by now and they are a great example of what we refer to as “couple goals.” Recently, they were guests on Dax Shepard’s podcast, Armchair Expert and there they revealed that they don’t bathe their kids very often. We wanted to delve a bit deeper into it and find out exactly why showering daily is not a part of their routine.

Dads Are Pleading for Changing Tables in Men’s Restrooms and Receive Massive Support

People

7 months ago

A father is challenging societal norms and advocating for change in parenting dynamics. Initially centered around the absence of changing tables in men’s restrooms, this journey goes deeper. Join in as the narrative unfolds, shedding light on the evolving dynamics of modern parenthood.

Demi Moore Opened Up About Losing a Baby With Ashton Kutcher

Relationships

8 months ago

Demi Moore is an open person, and she decided to share a traumatic experience with the public, so it can be helpful for anyone. In an interview, the 61-year-old actress spilled the beans about her past marriage to Ashton Kutcher, whom she began dating in 2003 during what she calls a “do-over” phase.

Ashton Kutcher’s Twin Admits to Being “Jealous” of Brother Who Saved His Life

People

10 months ago

Sibling relationships can be complex, but love can overcome challenges and disagreements. Ashton Kutcher has repeatedly shown that he’s a good person beyond his entertainment career, especially when it comes to his brother, who has dealt with cerebral palsy since birth. Despite this obstacle, Ashton has gone above and beyond to support his brother in overcoming challenges.

17 Celebrities That Are Smarter Than Great Scientists

People

10 months ago

Famous Colombian singer, Shakira, was only 4 years old when she wrote her first poem. At the age of 13, she already had her first album. The average IQ is 100, and Shakira has 140, enough for her to get an invitation to Mensa, the world’s oldest high IQ society.Any IQ score that goes over 140 is considered as entering a genius territory. She never went to college, but she had a dream of becoming an anthropologist, a person who studies people within the present and past societies. Shakira speaks Spanish, English, French, Arabic, Portuguese, and Italian.

8 Celebrity Couples Who Didn’t Fall in Love at First Sight

Relationships

year ago

Love can be fast and exciting, but it can also be slow and nurturing. And oftentimes, happily ever after doesn’t always begin with love at first sight. Sometimes love is the product of a lot of work, a whole lot of coincidences, and definitely a lot of patience. And these stories of celebrities teach us that you don’t need to have the perfect beginning to earn the perfect ending with your loved one.

8 Celebrities Who Don’t See the Point of Showering Every Day

People

year ago

Showering too often might make your hair look more greasy, dry out your skin and even affect your reproductive health. And although we’re used to seeing celebrities who always look flawless, many of them admit they believe bathing regularly may do more harm than good. In fact, some of our favorite stars can go days without a shower and others only wash certain body parts.

How Demi Moore’s Resilience Didn’t Let Her Life Get Shattered by a Toxic Marriage With Ashton Kutcher

People

year ago

Her memorable performance in Ghost made us dream of a perfect relationship, but her private life has been nothing like a movie. Demi Moore has been through many ups and downs and a string of marriages to rediscover herself again. However, the stunning actress has proven her tenacity, emerging from her 6-year-long marriage to Ashton Kutcher stronger than ever.

“Demi and I Made a Choice to Put the Kids First.” Bruce Willis Proves That a Blended Family Can Be Happy Too

Family & kids

year ago

Going through a divorce is hard — not only for the couple, but for the children too. Divorced parents always have to share holidays and vacations with their kids, and having limited time to spend with your little ones can be painful. But actors Bruce Willis and Demi Moore chose to put their differences aside and blend their old and new families for the sake of their children.

15 Celebrity Couples Who Fell in Love After Being Friends First

Relationships

year ago

Almost 70% of romantic relationships begin as friendships, according to new research. This type of relationship is more likely to be the rule than the exception, and it is definitely the best way to start a romance with your crush. That’s why, when a celebrity becomes friends with another, it is only a matter of time before rumors start to spread about a “thing” happening between them.So, here at Bright Side, we are bringing you a long list of celebrities who turned their friendship into a relationship.

14 Celebrities With Surprising Educational Backgrounds

People

2 years ago

There are many reasons why we suddenly experience career shifts. And they’re totally normal! Maybe that’s why our favorite stars decided to heed the curtain call and choose the limelight instead of pursuing the degrees they prepared for in college. It would be a whole lot different to picture them in desk jobs, in labs, or even in the field aside from the projects they star in.

10 Celebrity Relationships That Prove Some Bonds Need Time to Grow

Relationships

10 months ago

While some couples fall in love with each other when they meet for the first time, many others develop a friendship first that might later turn romantic. Many celebrity couples had known each other for years but didn’t experience love at first sight. But love is often a mystery, and romantic feelings can develop many years later.

12 Celebrities Shared Witty Parenting Tips That May Help You in the Future

Family & kids

2 years ago

All parents can confirm that parenting is a tedious full-time job. In fact, there are more than 100 best-selling books to walk parents through this new phase of their lives. Parents are tasked with a very difficult job, so they, of course, are interested in as many tips and tricks as they can get, whether they come from a therapist or their favorite celebrity.

10 Celebrities Who Ended Up Marrying Their Celebrity Crush

People

year ago

Many of us have celebrity crushes and it’s no secret that we sometimes fantasize about being married to one. And even though to some of us it might seem unimaginable to even cross paths with them, to celebrities, this part is quite more believable and doable. Some celebrities were lucky enough not only to meet but even tie the knot with their celebrity crush, making their dreams come true.

18 Celebs Who Changed Their Real Names, and the Stories Behind Them

People

2 years ago

A school teacher from a small German town decided to give his student a nickname. The nickname ended up becoming the name of the future star — the lead singer of the band Scooter. And it’s great because his real name is pretty simple.

10 Times Celebrity Dads Opened Up About Fatherhood and Made Us Go “Aww”

People

3 years ago

To most of us, these celebrities are known for their roles in award-winning movies, or their accomplishments in sports. But when it comes to the highs and lows of parenting, they have to deal with changing diapers and toddler tantrums just like the rest of us.

10+ Celeb Secrets You Can Use to Bulletproof Your Beauty and Look Decades Younger

People

3 years ago

Some celebs like Jared Leto or Eva Mendes look like they were frozen 2 decades ago. Of course, genes play a crucial role, but still, there are some little secrets on top of this. For example, Natalie Portman came to a conclusion about which diet is better for her — vegan or vegetarian.

12 Celebrities Who Deserve the Best Stepparent Award

People

3 years ago

Celebrities, even if they have extravagant and luxurious lifestyles, go through many day-to-day situations just like many of us do. Many of them have partners and children. Others, in addition, have had the experience of being stepfathers and stepmothers, and even of having whole stepfamilies to take care of. Some of these celebrities have proudly stepped into this role, and are honored to show themselves with their stepchildren in public, like Ashton Kutcher, for example.

12 Times Actors Outdid Themselves to Get Into the Character They Played

Films

3 years ago

Signing autographs, endless photoshoots, and receiving long-awaited awards are not what the ordinary life of an actor or actress consists of. Their reality is much more prosaic: actors adhere to strict diets or gain weight, learn new skills (that can be fun, or not), and oftentimes work in conditions that are far from comfortable.

From Onscreen Couple to Marriage Goals: Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher’s Love Story Was Written in the Stars

People

4 years ago

Falling in love with your co-star is not uncommon in Hollywood. Take for instance Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell or Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively, both of these couples instantly fell for each other while working together. That’s what makes Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher different from their celebrity peers. It actually took them 14 years to go from meeting for the first time to becoming a couple, and here’s their story.

12 Celebrities With Big Hearts Who Didn’t Become Spoiled by Money and Fame

People

10 months ago

When we think of celebrities like Leonardo DiCaprio and Matt Damon, we’re happy that they’ve become successful. These people don’t just enjoy fame and money, but they also realize their importance in this word. Having a good heart is something they can use to change lives for the better and they’re a good example of this.

20 Movie Casts Who’ve Become True Families

Films

4 years ago

Nothing is more delightful than seeing the castmates of our favorite shows and movies to reunite after years. We know that they are the best pals while they’re on their promotion tours, and some have a genuine connection that makes them seem more like a family.

10 Celebrities That We Didn’t Expect Would Have a Twin

People

2 years ago

The world of entertainment is filled with famous twins, whether it’s Dylan and Cole Sprouse or Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen. Twins just seem to have that star quality. In fact, there are many celebrities you may not have even guessed actually have a twin brother or sister.

Famous Celebrities That Decided to Leave Their Kids Without a Legacy

People

2 years ago

Very often we envy the kids of celebrities because they get the fame and wealth of their famous parents from birth. Well, it turns out that not all parents want to leave their fabulous legacy to their kids. Sting, Bill Gates, George Lucas, and many others have already announced that all their wealth will be used for charity. So why do celebrities and businesspeople make these decisions?

20+ Parodies From an Australian Actress Whose Sense of Humor Helped Her Get to Hollywood

Photography

4 years ago

Celeste Barber is an Australian actress, comedian, writer, and celebrity in social media. She has more than 3.7 million people following her Instagram account. In 2015, she started a curious experiment with a goal of showing how the most popular photos and videos would look if instead of celebrities, average people had created them. The project has become so successful that now, Celeste is traveling around Australia and the US and is sharing the stories behind her photos and telling about her relationship with the celebrities she was copying. Her husband helps her with this project by assisting her and generating ideas. Among Celeste and her spouse's fans, there are such celebrities as Robbie Williams, Ashton Kutcher, Cindy Crawford, and Kris Jenner.
